translations.translation: They were defeated then and there, transformed into humbled men.
Thus there and then they were vanquished and overthrown, humiliated.
Pharaoh and his men were defeated and put to shame,
The magicians who were defeated on the spot and were proved to be worthless,
They were therefore defeated here and they turned back humiliated.
So they were defeated there and returned disgraced.
Thus they were vanquished there, and they went back abased.
So they were vanquished there, and they turned about, humbled.
Thus were they there defeated and brought low.
Pharaoh and his men were defeated and utterly humiliated.
Thus they were overcome and made to look abiect.
Thereat they were vanquished, and they retreated, humiliated.
So the (great ones) were vanquished there and then, and were made to look small.
So they were defeated there and then, and were returned disgraced.
they were defeated and turned belittled,
There they were defeated, and utterly reduced.
And Pharaoh and his people were overcome right there and became debased.
[7:119] Thus were they, that is, Pharaoh and his folk, there defeated, becoming humiliated — they ended up abased.
(Thus were they there defeated) upon which Moses was victorious against them (and brought low) and they were humiliated.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَغُلِبُواْ } أي: فرعون وملؤه { هُنَالِكَ } في المجمع { وَٱنقَلَبُواْ } أي: رجعوا منه { صَاغِرِينَ } [الأعراف: 119] ذليلين محزونين بعدما خرجوا متكبرين مستغلبين


{ وَ } بعدما شاهد السحرة من أمر موسى ما شاهدوا
 وانكشفوا بحقيته وصدقه بحذب رقيق من جانب الحق
 وإلهام تام منه سبحانه { أُلْقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سَاجِدِينَ } [الأعراف: 120] متذللين
 واضعين جباههم على تراب المذلة
